comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Looking towards Manly from Steele Point (?) - I think this is the US Fleet leaving Sydney on 6 August 1925. Read all about it - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/16213029

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content:
" The first ship to leave was tho West Virginia, followed by the Colorado, Maryland, Tennessee, New Mexico, Mississippi, Idaho, and then the flagship, California, with the hospital ship Relief last. "
From the SMH article above
